pages.text: In Vanilla, you might expect to start by punching a tree. Not in TFC! Scattered all over the ground are rocks and sticks. You will need both. Pick them up by $(4)right-clicking $(). $(br2)Once you have at least two rocks, hold them in your hand. $(4)Right-clicking$() will open the $(thing)knapping interface. $(4)Left-click$() to chip bits of rock off to make an axe and some knives.

We've skipped wooden tools entirely! This process is called $(thing)knapping$(). For all knapping recipes, see the $(l:reference/rock_knapping)reference section$(). Next we'll want to make a knife blade.
With clever handling of the rock, you can make two knife blades at once. Craft both your new tool heads with sticks in order to make proper stone tools.
